mapper.select: SELECT o.oDate, o.oId, p.pName, p.pImg, p.pPrice, d.count, (p.pPrice * d.count), d.pNo, o.delivery FROM tr_order o INNER JOIN tr_orderDetails d ON o.oId = d.oId INNER JOIN tr_product p ON d.pNo = p.pNo WHERE o.userId = #{userId} ORDER BY oDate DESC
SELECT qNo, qTitle, qDate, qContent FROM tr_qna WHERE qWriter = #{userId} ORDER BY qDate DESC
mapper.update: UPDATE tr_member SET userName = #{userName}, userPass = #{userPass}, userEmail = #{userEmail}, userPhone = #{userPhone}, userAddr = #{userAddr}, userBday = #{userBday} WHERE userId = #{userId}
